Elastica

An open-source software package for simulations of Cosserat Rods

Elastica is a free and open-source software project for the simulation of slender one-dimensional bodies using Cosserat Rod theory.

See examples of how modeling Cosserat Rods with Elastica has enabled new scientific discoveries

Learn more about:

Cosserat Rod Theory
Elastica Software
